promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic wolf psychic-type pokemon with a ancient tail. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name

It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Synchronoise. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "psychic" or "Lunacanis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, wolf-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This nocturnal pup, known for its telepathic prowess, dwells in caverns and uses Synchronoise to harmonize its pack's emotions, ensuring unity.
